yo: Abímbọ́lá Adédigba ti ní àfojúsùn gidi fún ohun tó ṣẹlẹ̀
en: Abimbola Adédigba has a real target for what happened

yo: Bàbá a Túnjí sọ pé èrò òun ni láti ní ojúlé mẹ́ta láìpẹ́
en: Tunji's father said that his intention is to have three sites soon

yo: Ọlọ́pàá, èwo ni tèpè, mo pariwo mọ́ ìyá mi.
en: Police, who's calling, I shouted at my mother.

yo: Adájọ́ mẹ́ta ní agbègbè Òkè Onírin àti Òmù Àrán bá ara wọn sọ̀rọ̀.
en: Three judges in Oke Oniri and Omu Aran areas talked to each other.

yo: Ibi ìkọ̀kọ̀ ni ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà ti wáyé, kó tó jáde sí gbangba.
en: The event took place in secret, before it went public.

yo: Ìgbòho àti àwọn ọmọlẹ́yìn ẹ̀ ti gbógun ti ìjọba Ọ̀yọ́
en: Igbho and his followers have attacked the government of Oyo

yo: Gbogbo ètò àwọn amúgbálẹ̀gbẹ̀ẹ́ e wa ló doríkodò báyìí
en: All the plans of our neighbors are upside down now

yo: Wọn kò tíì rí adájọ́ tí yóò buwọ́lu béèlì i wọn lọ́jọ́ yẹn.
en: They have not yet found a judge who will sign their bail that day.

yo: Ó ṣeéṣe kí adájọ́ mìíràn jáde wá láti ṣe ìdájọ́ mìíràn.
en: It is possible that another judge will come out to make another judgment.

yo: Ta ló buwọ́lu ìwé e béèlì àwọn méjìlá tí ìjọba mú lọ sí ilé ẹjọ́
en: Who signed the bail document of the twelve people who were taken to court by the government

yo: Gbajúmọ̀ òṣèré kan ni àwọn aráìlú ti kọjú ìjà sí
en: An actor's popularity has been fought against by ordinary people

yo: Ọ̀nà láti ta ọjà ló mú kí àwọn òǹṣèré máa ṣeré oníhòhò.
en: The way to sell the product is what makes the players play the game.

yo: Bí o kò ba yọjú síwájú ilé, a ò ní fi ọlọ́pàá mú ẹ mọ́.
en: If you do not show up in front of the house, we will not arrest you with the police.

yo: Túndé ló fi ọlọ́pàá gbé Alága Ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ ní Ìlọrin.
en: Tunde used the police to pick up the Chairman of the Executive Committee in Ilorin.

yo: Mo tún ti pàsẹ fún Goríọlá  lórí ipò rẹ̀ bi ọba ìlú Arámọkọ
en: I have also ordered Goríola on his position as the king of Aramokko

yo: Nígbà tí mo lọ sí ìlú ọba, mo pàdé àwọn ọmọbìnrin méjì.
en: When I went to the king's city, I met two girls.

yo: Gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Ọ̀ṣun ní àsìkò ti tó kí ará ìlú lọ ra ìbọn tiwọn
en: The governor of Osun state has time for the citizens to buy their own guns

yo: Ó yẹ kí àwọn ará ìlú ní nǹkan ìjà láti dáàbò bo ara wọn
en: Citizens should have weapons to protect themselves

yo: Àwọn ìlú mìíràn ti bọ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn agbébọn tí a ń sọ̀rọ̀ ọ wọn yìí.
en: Other cities have been spared from the gunmen we are talking about.

yo: Àmọ̀tẹ́kùn ní àwọn kọ́ làwọn pa ọmọ ọdún mẹ́ẹ̀dógun tí a sọ
en: But they are not the ones who killed the 15-year-old we mentioned

yo: Wọ́n tún ti yìnbọn pa àwọn mẹ́fà ní ìlú Ìbàdàn lọ́jọ́ náà
en: Six people were also shot dead in the city of Ibadan that day

yo: Òótọ́ ni pé àwọn ọmọ yìí ní ibi tí wọ́n ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ lóru ọ̀gànjọ́
en: It is true that these children have a place where they work at midnight

yo: Olùdarí ilé iṣẹ́ amóhùnmáwòrán Ìlọrin ti kọ̀wé fi ipò o ẹ̀ sílẹ̀.
en: The director of Ilorin Audiovisual Company has resigned from his post.

yo: Àlùfáà mẹ́sàán ló tọrọ àforíjì lọ́wọ́ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọ́n bá jà
en: Nine priests apologize to students if they fight

yo: Ta ni àwọn tó fi ẹnu kò lẹ́nu nínú ètò tí a wò lánàá?
en: Who are the people who kissed in the program we watched yesterday?

yo: Ilé ti wó lu Bísí àti àwọn ọmọ ẹ̀yin rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn-in eré e bọ́ọ̀lù.
en: The house collapsed on Bisi and his children after the football game.

yo: Wọ́n gé ẹsẹ̀ Adékúnlé nítorí pé ó ti ń jẹrà
en: Adékunle's leg was amputated because he was sick

yo: Inú ìrora ni bàba Kúnlé wà kí Dókítà tó báa sọ̀rọ̀ ìfẹ́.
en: Kunle's father was in pain before the doctor spoke of love.

yo: Nígbà tí ebi bá pa mí, màá jáde lọ ra ẹ̀pà àti gúgúrú níta
en: When I'm hungry, I go out to buy peanuts and chickpeas

yo: Ẹgbẹ́ fún ìdàgbàsókè ọrọ̀ ajé ti fún àwọn obìnrin lówó níbàdàn.
en: The group for economic development has given money to women.

yo: Arẹ́gbẹ́ṣọlá àti Àmọ̀lé ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ ẹ ìyanṣẹ́lódì lónìí ní Àkúrẹ́
en: Argeshola and Hoganle have started their mission today in Akure.

yo: Dèjì àti àwọn akẹgbẹ́ ẹ̀ ní kí wọ́n tí gbogbo ọjà pa.
en: Deji and his companions asked them to kill all the goods.

yo: Láti má ba kó sí kòtò ayé, bàbá à mi gbà mí níyànjú nípa ọ̀rẹ́ yíyàn.
en: In order not to end up in the pit of the world, my father advised me to choose a friend.

yo: Àwọn èèkàn ẹgbẹ́ ní ilẹ̀ Yorùbá sọ pé bí nǹkan ṣe rí kò rọrùn
en: The members of the Yoruba community say that the way things are is not easy

yo: Ìlera pẹ̀lú àbò ní Nàìjíríà kò tẹ́ àwọn ará ìlú lọ́rùn rárá
en: Health and safety in Nigeria does not satisfy the citizens at all

yo: Bí àwọn ará ìlú bá ní ìbọn fún àbò ara wọn, kò burú o
en: If the citizens have guns for their own protection, it is not bad

yo: Ṣé mo jọ ẹni tó le è gba ọ̀nà oko sá kúrò ní ìlú ni?
en: Am I like the person who drove him out of the city on the highway?

yo: Nàìjíríà ni Adéṣọlá ti fèsì sí ìróyín pé ó yọ́ kẹ́lẹ́ jáde sálọ.
en: Adesola has responded to the report that he escaped from Nigeria.

yo: Ìyàwó àwọn ọlọ́pàá tó kú lásìkò ìwọ́de tó kọjá ti bẹ̀bẹ̀ fún ìrànwọ́
en: Wife of police officer who died last year has appealed for help

yo: Sọ̀wédowo tí ọ̀gá àgbà ọlọ́pàá fún àwọn akọ̀wé kò gbówó jáde o.
en: The check that the chief of police gave to the clerks did not come out.

yo: Ọbásanjọ́ ti kọ̀ nítorí i wàhálà tó ń wáyé lẹ́gbẹ́ òṣèlú u rẹ̀
en: Obasanjo has refused because of the problems that are happening with his political

yo: Alága ìpínlẹ̀ Ayédáadé ti mórílè ilé ààrẹ tẹ́lẹ̀ láti lọ bẹ̀bẹ̀.
en: The chairman of Ayedadade state has already visited the president's house to pray.

yo: Ìjọba Èkó ti fòfin de ọjà títà àti títọọrọ báárà lójú títì
en: The Government of Lagos has banned the sale of goods and prostitution in private

yo: A ò lè fá orí lẹ́yìn olórí ni Abíọ́lá máa ń sọ nígbà ayé ẹ̀.
en: Abiola used to say during his lifetime that we cannot shave our head after the leader.

yo: Mo bó nínú àrùn àti òṣì nínú ọdún tí a fẹ́ kó sí yìí.
en: I am sick and poor in this year that we want to live.

yo: Kókósẹ̀, orúnkún àti apá ni ó máa ń ro mí tí mo bá wà lẹ́nú iṣẹ́
en: Ankles, knees and arms are the ones that bother me when I'm at work

yo: Ìrora náà ti máa ń pọ̀ jù fún mi tí mi ò bá tíì lo òògùn mi.
en: The pain is too much for me if I don't take my medicine.

yo: Ìgbẹ́jọ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí àwọn olùkọ sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ẹ̀ tí bẹ̀rẹ̀
en: Student-teacher whistleblower case begins

yo: Agbẹjọ́rò kan sọ pé àfi kí ìjọba sàn mílíọ̀nù owó gbà-má-bínú fún òun.
en: A lawyer said that unless the government pays him millions of money, don't be angry with him.

yo: Àṣà Yorùbá ni pé kí a máa kí àwọn àgbàlagbà láàárọ̀.
en: The Yoruba custom is to greet elders in the morning.

yo: Ohun tí Yorùbá ń pè ní Èṣù yàtọ̀ sí Sátánì nínú ẹ̀sìn ìgbàgbọ́.
en: What Yoruba call Èṣù is different from Satan in religion.

yo: Nínú àṣà a wa, Òrìṣà tó ń jẹ́ Èṣù ní iṣẹ́ rere lọ́wọ́
en: In our culture, the God who is the Èṣù has a good job in hand

yo: Ojú ará ìlú rí màbo pẹ̀lú u bí àwọn jàǹdùkú ṣe sọ àjọ̀dún di ìjà
en: The eyes of the people of the city were not with him as the mobs turned the festival into a fight

yo: Àwọn Fúlàní kan ní ìpínlẹ̀ Oǹdó ti sá lọ sí Èkìtì
en: Some Fulani in Ondo state have fled to Ekiti

yo: Ayọ̀ tí wọ́n pa mọ̀lẹ́bí ẹ̀ ní Ìlú Ìdànrè ti pariwo síta
en: The joy that was kept in his family in the city of Idanre was loud outside

yo: Ọlọ́pàá ti mú àwọn afurasí tó pa oníṣòwò ní ìlú Ọ̀tà
en: The police have arrested the suspects who killed a businessman in Ota town

yo: Ẹ̀rọ ìgbowó kan ni wọ́n lò ní àbọ̀dé ìgbẹ́jọ́ ọ Ìgbòho
en: A money machine was used in the middle of the Igbho trial

yo: Ifẹ̀ àti Mọdákẹ́kẹ́ ni wọn ò tíì pari ìjà a wọn láti ọjọ́ yìí
en: Love and Modakekek have not finished their fight since this day

yo: Wàhálà tún ti bẹ́ sílẹ̀ láàrín Ifẹ̀ àti Mọdákẹ́kẹ́ lẹ́yìnọ̀rẹyìn
en: Trouble has finally broken out between Love and Car

yo: Irọ́ tí àwọn kan pa mọ́ ọmọ Mọdákẹ́kẹ́ márùn-ún ló fàá
en: It was a lie that some people kept about the five children of Modakekek

yo: Ikọ̀ ajagun mẹ́fà ni wọ́n ti ń jó lójú u pópónà Ìbàdàn sí Èkó
en: Six warriors were dancing in front of him on the road from Ibadan to Eko

yo: Wọ́n tún lọ sí ibùdó ìgbafẹ́ kan láti ṣeré yàtọ̀ sí èyí tí wọ́n ṣe tẹ́lẹ̀
en: They also went to a recreation center to play different from the one they did before.

yo: Gàní ní kò dín ní bílíọ̀nù mẹ́ta tí àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ ẹ Yorùbá ti san
en: It is not less than three billion that the Yoruba people have paid

yo: Kò ní dára fún àwọn ajínigbé àárín ìlú u wa láti òní lọ.
en: It will not be good for the kidnappers in the city from now on.

yo: Láti ọdún méjì sẹ́yìn ni a ti ń bá àwọn ìwà ìbàjẹ́ yìí fínra.
en: Since two years ago, we have been dealing with these corrupt practices.

yo: Àpótí ìdìbo òní páálí láwọn àlejò yóò fí wọlé síbi àpéjẹ̀ náà
en: Today's ballot box will be brought in by guests to the convention

yo: Búlọ́kù igba náírà ti di ọgọ́rin náírà ní ìpínlẹ̀ Ọ̀yọ́.

yo: Ìjọba Oǹdó fẹ́ mú kí àwọn olówò búlọ́kù tutọ́ sójú ara wọn
en: The Ondo government wants to make the block merchants spit on each other

yo: Àwọn ajínigbé ti yìnbọn pa ara wọn lẹ́yìn èdè àiyedè lórí owó pínpín
en: The kidnappers shot themselves dead after a misunderstanding over sharing money

yo: Ṣé lóòtọ́ọ́ ni pé Yẹ̀kínì lè gba ife ẹ̀yẹ lọ́dún tó ń bọ̀?

yo: Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́gboyè méjìlélọ́gọ́ta ló ń ta àkàrà nílùú Òṣogbo

yo: Ìpànìyàn tó wáye ni abúle Agbájé kìí ṣe ìjà láàrín Ifẹ̀ àti Mọdákẹ́kẹ́
en: The killing that took place in Agbaje village was not a fight between Love and Modakeke.

yo: Gbajúmọ̀ oníṣòwò ilé ijó kan ní Oshòdì ti ṣàlàyé ìgbésí ayé e rẹ̀
en: A famous dance hall businessman in Oshodi has explained his life

yo: Báwo ni ẹni tí a bí nínú òṣì ṣe di ẹni tí aráyé ń wárí fún?
en: How did the person who was born in poverty become the person that people are looking for?

yo: Àjọ̀dún ọdún Emèrè ló wáyé lẹ́ẹ̀mejì nínú ìlú Ayédáadé
en: The festival of the year of Emere was held twice in the city of Ayédaade

yo: Wo àwọn ohun tó ṣẹlẹ̀ níbi àjọ̀dún ẹgbẹ́ Emèrè Onítẹ̀síwájú l'Ósogbo
en: See what happened at the festival of the Progressive Champion in Osogbo

yo: Alákóso ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Ọ̀yọ́ nígbàkanrí ni Adétúnjí Ìdòwú Olúrìn
en: The former governor of Oyo state was Adétunji Idowwu Olúrin

yo: Àwọn ajínigbé ti tú àwọn ọmọ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ Akínyẹlé mẹ́ẹ̀dọ́gun sílẹ̀
en: Kidnappers release 15 Akinyele students

yo: Bọ̀dé sọ pé ẹ̀ẹ̀kan péré ni òun bá ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú òun ṣeré papọ̀

yo: Ẹgbẹ́ alákùkọ ti sọ ìdí tí àwọn fi kùnà láti wọlé ìbò o gómìnà ní Èkó

yo: Ilé iṣé ọlọ́pàá ti rọ àwọn akọ̀ròyìn láti lépa àlááfíà lórí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ìjẹta
en: The police department has urged journalists to pursue peace over the incident

yo: Gbogbo ìṣekúpani tó wáyé nílùú Mọdákẹ́kẹ́ ti ba gbogbo wa nínú jẹ́
en: All the killings that took place in the city of Modakekek have saddened us all

yo: Ìjọba sọ pé kí wọ́n ka gbogbo ẹranko igbó àti ẹja inú omi
en: The government said that all wild animals and fish in the water should be counted

yo: Ṣọlá gbé Bùhári lọ sílé ẹjọ́ lórí owó tó dàwátì lábẹ́ ẹ̀, nílé iṣẹ́ ìjọba
en: Shola took Buhari to court over the money he received under him, in the government office

yo: Mo faramọ́ àtúntò iṣẹ́ ìjọba tí kò lọ́wọ́ ìṣèlú nínú
en: I am familiar with the restructuring of the government that does not involve politics

yo: Ọba Adékúnlé Fárántí ti kúnlẹ̀ fún ìyàwó ẹ̀ tó gbá létí níjọ́sí
en: King Adékunle Faranti has knelt down for his wife who died yesterday

yo: Àdìgún Ọlọ́wẹ̀ ti di ọmọ ọdún márùn ún báyíí, ó ti tó lọ ilé ìwé
en: Adigung Ololawa is now five years old, he has already gone to school

yo: Àlàbí Adémọ́lá ti jẹ oyè kan nílùú Èkìtì kí ń tó dé láti ìrìn àjò
en: Álibi Adémola had been a household name in Ekiti before he arrived from a trip

yo: Ààrẹ tuntun fún Ìlú Ọ̀yọ́ ti ṣe ìbúra ní Ṣẹ̀pẹ̀tẹ̀rí fún àwọn elégbè lẹ́yin ẹ̀
en: The new president for Ilu Oyo has taken the oath of office in Shepeteri for his followers.

yo: Oúnjẹ mẹ́ta lójúmọ́ kò dára fún àwọn ará ìlú Adérójú
en: Three meals a day is not good for the people of Adéroj

yo: Babátúndé Gbàdàmọ́sí ti ta gbogbo dúkìá ẹ̀ lásìkò tí ebi ń paá
en: Babatunde Gbadamosi sold all his possessions when he was starving

yo: Mo pàdé Alàgbà afọ́jú kan kí ń tó padà di eèyàn lónìí
en: I met a blind Elder before he became human today

yo: Àwọn jàndùkú agbébọn ti gbẹ̀mí èèyàn méfà ní Bódìjà lópin ọ̀sẹ̀

yo: Tinúbú ní ọmọdé kò lè ṣèjọba Nàìjíríà bí àwọn àgbàlagbà ṣe le ṣeé

yo: Ifá jẹ́ ẹ̀sìn àti ìgbàgbọ́ àwọn Yorùbá àti àwọn Oníṣẹ̀ṣe
en: Ifa is the religion and belief of the Yorubas and the Craftsmen

yo: Gbogbo èèyàn ló ń fẹ́ kí Buhari fún àwọn láàyè láti yanjú ìṣoro àsìkò yìí
en: Everyone wants Buhari to give them permission to solve the problem of this time

yo: Aláàfin Ọláyíwọlá Adéyẹmí ni ó ti re ibi àgbà ń rè lọ́sẹ̀ tó kọjá
en: Alaifin Olayywala Adeyemimi was born last week.

yo: Fúnkẹ́ Akíndélé Béllò ni ó ń ṣe eré tí wọn ń pè ní Jẹ́nífà
en: Funke Akindélé Bellò is playing a game called Jenifa

yo: Diípọ̀ ní òun ti ní ìjákulẹ̀ nínú ìgbéyàwó òun àkọ́kọ́
en: He had many disappointments in his first marriage

yo: Ayọ̀kù ti fẹ́rẹ̀ gbẹ̀mí Ìyá ìyàwó ẹ̀ ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò gbà fún-un
en: Ayoku almost killed his wife's mother but they did not allow him

yo: Gómìnà a Kogí ti ṣàlàyé ìdí tó fi ní káwọn èèyàn máa di ìhámọ́ra ogun
en: The governor of Kogi has explained why he wants people to be armed

yo: Yánpọnyánrin ń fẹjú síi ní orílẹ̀ èdè e wa bí a ṣe ń gbọ́.
en: YánPyonyanrin is becoming more and more popular in our country as we hear.

yo: Àwámárídìí ni oun tí olúwa ṣe fún ìdílé àwọn Adéoyè
en: He is Awámárídí that God made for the Adéoye family

yo: Ìyanulolúwa kò bẹ̀rù àṣẹ ilé ẹjọ́, ó ní kí ẹgbẹ́ má bàjẹ́ ni tòun
en: Iyanululuwa is not afraid of the court's order, he asked that the group not be damaged

yo: Gómìnà obìnrin ẹyọ̀kan péré la ti ní ní ìpínlẹ̀ Ayédé
en: We have only one female governor in Ayéde state

yo: Adájọ́ kọ̀ láti dá àwọn ọmọlẹ́yìn Ìgbòho mẹ́rin padà sílé
en: The judge refused to return the four followers of Igbho

yo: Ọbásanjọ́ ń dọ̀bálẹ̀ fún àwọn ọba bíi mẹ́ta lọ́jọ́ kannáà.
en: Obasanjo was bowing down to three kings on the same day.

yo: Wo ìgbà mẹ́tẹ̀ẹ̀ta tí Olúṣẹ́gun Ọbásanjọ́ dọ̀bálẹ̀ gbalaja níwájú àwọn oríadé
en: Look at the three times that Obasanjo the Conqueror fell down in front of the Oriadés

yo: Gómìnà Oyètọ́lá ti pè fún alàáfíà láàrín àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ẹ rẹ̀

yo: Alágbádá ti gbóṣùbà fún Gbóyèga Fámọdún kó tó gbée lọ sílé ẹjọ́
en: Alágada has given a warning to Gbóyega Famodun before going to court

yo: Nítoríi kí àlùfáà lè máa rí iṣẹ́ ṣe ní wọ́n kò ṣe kó Àlùmájìrí jọ
en: Because the priest could do his work, they did not gather Alumajiri

yo: Ọlágúnsóyè Oyinlọlá ti wá sílé láti fi ìdí ohun tó dáa hàn
en: Olagunsoye Oyinllola has come home to show what is good

yo: Mẹ́fà nínú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ilé ẹ̀kọ́ ọ Ìkọlàbà ni ó ti kú sí ojú ọ̀nà

yo: Odò Ògùnpa ti kún, ó sì ti ń ṣàn lọ sí àárín ọjà láti gbé wa lọ.
en: The Ogunpa River is full and is flowing to the middle of the market to take us.

yo: Bùhárí sọ pé òun gbé àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ náà nítorí ìjàm̀bá ọkọ̀.
en: Buhari said he took the steps because of a car accident.

yo: Amẹ́ríkà ń fẹ́ ìdájọ́ òdodo lórí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ọjọ́sí tó ṣẹlẹ̀ ní èkó.
en: America wants justice for the age-old incident that happened in education.

yo: Ohun tí ojú àwọn obìnrin rí nígbà tí wọ́n bá ń bímọ le gidi.
en: What women see when they give birth is real.

yo: Adéṣọlá ti ṣe gbogbo oun tí babaláwo ní kó ṣe.
en: Adéşola has done everything that the father asked him to do.

yo: Adéwọlé ti kéde bí yóò ṣe ná owó tó rí gbà lọ́wọ́ Ọ̀tẹ́dọlá
en: Adédele has announced how he will spend the money he received from Otedola

yo: Ilé iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá ìpínlẹ̀ Ọ̀ṣun ti fun àwọn ará ìlú ní alùpùpù mẹ́fà
en: Osun State Police Office has given six motorcycles to the people of the city

yo: Lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n gbẹ́sẹ̀ lé ìyàwó Ọọ̀ni, ó bínú lọ gun ọ̀kadà
en: After they attacked Oni's wife, he got angry and ran away

yo: Oyèlékè ti rí ẹ̀bùn ńlá gbà láti ọ̀dọ̀ ìjọba lásìkò ìwọ́de náà
en: Oyeleke received a large gift from the government during the war

yo: Ilé iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá Ọ̀ṣun ti kède ìgbésẹ̀ tó fẹ́ gbé láti fi ojú àṣebi hàn
en: Osun Police Department has announced the steps it wants to take to show the face of the culprit

yo: Ẹgbẹ́ àwọ òṣèré ti jáwé e gbélé ẹ fún Akin Olúkọ̀yà àti ọ̀rẹ́ ẹ̀
en: The group of actors has left it for Akin Olukoyya and his friend

yo: Ọmọ àdánwò ni Oyèdé àti àwọn ọmọlẹ́yìn ẹ tó ń kọrin.
en: Oyedé and his followers who sing are children of the test.

yo: Ìyàwó o bàbá onílé ìtura ti sàlàyé ipò tí ọkọ rẹ̀ wà lórí ẹ̀sùn yìí.
en: The wife and father of the hotel owner have explained the situation of her husband on this charge.

yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ilé iṣẹ́ Adéagbo méje ló wá bá wa ṣe àjọyọ̀ ní Ifẹ̀.
en: Seven Adéagbo company employees came to celebrate with us in Ife.

yo: Ìyà púpọ̀ ló ń jẹ àwọn ọmọdé méjèjì tí mo pàdé lọ́nà
en: The two children that I met on the way were very worried

yo: Àwọn mẹ́ta ni ikú mú lọ lọ́jọ́ tí àwọn ọlọ́pàá yìnbọn sókè
en: Three people were killed the day the police shot up

yo: Olúwo sọ pé kí àwọn babaláwo Yorùbá mọ ìwọ̀n ara wọn
en: Oluwo said that Yoruba men should know their body size

yo: Agbẹjọ́rò ẹbí olóògbé Láwuyì ti yá owó ńlá kan ní báǹkì
en: The lawyer of the late Lawuyi's family has borrowed a large sum of money from the bank

yo: Adégborúwà sọ pé àwọn ìgbìmọ̀ olùwádìí nìkan lóń bá òun sọ̀rọ̀
en: Adégboruwa said that he only talks to the investigative committees

yo: Bàbá a Sùwé ti wo ohun tó fẹ́ wò nínú eré ìdárayá náà.
en: Suwe's father has seen what he wants to see in the game.

yo: Ìgbà tí Jọlá rẹ́rìín ni mo mọ̀ pé mo fẹ́ràn-an bí ojú ẹ̀ ṣe rí
en: It was when Jola laughed that I knew I loved the way her face looked

yo: Ọmọ olóògbé ni orúkọ ẹ̀ ń jẹ́ Adétúnjí Ẹlẹ́wà, ọmọkùnrin.
en: The deceased's son's name is Adétunji Enwawa, a boy.

yo: Adéwálé ti bẹ ilé ẹjọ́ láti gbà òun láàyè láti bá ìyàwó òun sọ̀rọ̀
en: Adéwale has asked the court to allow him to talk to his wife

yo: Bọ́lá Tinúbú kò rán ẹnikẹ́ni níṣẹ́ láti bá òun polongo ìbò
en: Bola Tinubu did not send anyone to announce the vote with him

yo: Adégòkè Ọlọ́ṣundé ni ọmọlúàbí tó bá mi rí ìwé mi he
en: Adégoke Ólesundé is the kindest person who found my book with me

yo: Bàbá a Sùwé ti sọ fún ọmọ olóògbé pé kó má ṣe wàhálà mọ́
en: Suwe's father told the deceased's son not to cause any more trouble

yo: Gbogbo ohun tí bàbá mi kojú lọ́wọ́ àwọn ọlọ́pàá kò dára
en: Everything my father faced at the hands of the police was not good

yo: Ojisẹ Ọlọ́run ni òṣèré orí ìtàgé tó bá mi jẹ oúnjẹ mi ní ìjẹta
en: God's messenger is the actor on the stage who eats my food with me

yo: Ilé iṣẹ́ adójútòfò sọ pé àwọn kò ní dá sí gbogbo ohun tó ṣẹlẹ̀
en: The company said that they will not intervene in everything that happened
